item.title: 洛杉矶道奇队球星大谷翔平（Shohei Ohtani）在自己的 Instagram 上向粉丝们发布了一份惊喜声明，透露自己已与一位来自日本的女士结婚。
item.description:
In a surprise statement to his fans posted on his Instagram, Los Angeles Dodgers star Shohei Ohtani revealed he has gotten married to a woman from Japan. https://t.co/Ratx4qlr0Y

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：CVS 和沃尔格林连锁药店宣布，将于本月内在美国多个州开始销售堕胎药米非司酮。拜登总统在一份声明中称此举是确保人们获得这种药物的 "重要里程碑"。
item.description:
BREAKING: CVS and Walgreens will begin selling the abortion pill mifepristone within the month in several states, the pharmacy chains announced.

In a statement, Pres. Biden called the move an "important milestone" in ensuring access to the drug. https://t.co/23vlhbmZdn pic.twitter.com/1rviFolgbm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：CVS 和沃尔格林连锁药店周五宣布，将于本月内在美国多个州开始销售堕胎药米非司酮。
item.description:
BREAKING: CVS and Walgreens will begin selling the abortion pill mifepristone within the month in several states, the pharmacy chains announced Friday. https://t.co/JOpy0x6PwZ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 一位妈妈在卡尔加里国际机场拍下了小女儿与好朋友一起旅行时的激动反应。
item.description:
A mom captured her young daughter's excited reaction at Calgary International Airport when she was surprised with a trip with her best friend. https://t.co/Eq82QMfEXL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 尼基-黑利（Nikki Haley）周五重申了她将在 "超级星期二 "之前继续参加总统初选的承诺，并暗示在 "超级星期二 "之后是否继续参选将取决于她在初选和党团会议中是否仍有 "竞争力"。
item.description:
Nikki Haley on Friday reiterated her promise to stay in the presidential primary race through Super Tuesday, hinting that decisions to stay in the race beyond Tuesday will be based on whether she's still "competitive" in primaries and caucuses. https://t.co/wk8j2GTZ0J

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 据新闻报道，周四晚间，一架载有包括歌手 Karol G 在内的 16 人的私人飞机在洛杉矶机场紧急迫降。
item.description:
A private airplane carrying 16 people, including singer Karol G, made an emergency landing at a Los Angeles airport Thursday evening, a news report said. https://t.co/vMEY0KQ4s0 pic.twitter.com/mu4Ub0HS9D

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 对于那些在 Chick-fil-A 点餐时多蘸了一杯酸甜可口的波利尼西亚酱汁的人来说，是时候把它扔掉了。
item.description:
For anyone who's saved an extra dipping cup of the sweet and sour Polynesian sauce from a Chick-fil-A order, it's time to toss it out. https://t.co/cTgurXgjq7

item.title: 新消息：当局称，费城发现两人头部中弹身亡，目前正在对这起双重凶杀案进行调查。
item.description:
NEW: A double homicide investigation is underway after two people were both found fatally shot in the head in Philadelphia, authorities said. https://t.co/HZhaiPBHus

item.title: 威尔士亲王威廉王子访问威尔士，纪念圣大卫节。他收到了一位小球迷赠送的水仙花，然后又收到了一件印有他名字的雷克瑟姆足球俱乐部球衣，并与联合主席、《阳光灿烂的日子》（It's Always Sunny）主演罗布-麦克艾伦尼（Rob McElhenney）共饮一杯。
item.description:
Prince William, Prince of Wales, marked St. David's Day with a visit to Wales.

He was given a daffodil by a young fan, before receiving a Wrexham AFC shirt with his name on and sharing a drink with co-chairman and "It's Always Sunny" star Rob McElhenney. https://t.co/AkmiY8smL3 pic.twitter.com/kiZN2Fa7mD

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：米歇尔-特罗科尼斯（Michelle Troconis）因涉嫌与男友分居的妻子詹妮弗-杜洛斯（Jennifer Dulos）失踪案而受审，她的所有罪名均被认定成立。
item.description:
BREAKING: Michelle Troconis, who stood trial in connection with the disappearance of Jennifer Dulos, her boyfriend's estranged wife, has been found guilty on all counts. https://t.co/aVfBiwc51k

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：凯文-莫纳汉（Kevin Monahan）是一名纽约男子，他在一辆拐错车道的汽车上开枪射杀了一名妇女，周五他因二级谋杀罪被判处 25 年至终身监禁。
item.description:
BREAKING: Kevin Monahan, a New York man who fatally shot a woman in a car that turned into the wrong driveway, was sentenced Friday to 25 years to life for his second-degree murder conviction. https://t.co/uJEylfOaJE pic.twitter.com/0xiwSIgOl2

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: "如果不是我的家人和朋友有能力把钱存到我的银行账户上，我早就流落街头了。"最近的一项研究发现，半数美国租房者为住房成本所累，这反映了全国租房者面临的严峻现实。
item.description:
"Had I not had family and friends that could afford to just put money in my bank account, I'd be on the streets.”

Half of American renters are burdened by the cost of housing, a recent study found, capturing the grim reality facing renters nationwide. https://t.co/Z34j7c2bCn

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 医护人员彼得-西丘尼耶克（Peter Cichuniec）因 2019 年 23 岁的伊莱贾-麦克莱恩（Elijah McClain）之死被判犯有刑事过失杀人罪，将于周五被判刑。
item.description:
Paramedic Peter Cichuniec will be sentenced Friday after being convicted of criminally negligent homicide in connection with the 2019 death of 23-year-old Elijah McClain. https://t.co/wlGr22avDr

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 根据周五公布的一份死因调查报告，英国王室姻亲托马斯-金斯顿（Thomas Kingston）显然死于自杀。
item.description:
Thomas Kingston, a member by marriage of Britain's royal family, has died by apparent suicide, according to an inquest released Friday. https://t.co/PAWSNzM6mw

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：法官斯科特-麦卡菲（Scott McAfee）将于今天下午听取关于取消检察官法尼-威利斯（Fani Willis）资格的动议的最后辩论，该动议基于她与检察官内森-韦德（Nathan Wade）的恋爱关系而获得经济利益的指控。
item.description:
LATEST: Judge Scott McAfee will hear what are expected to be final arguments this afternoon on motions to disqualify DA Fani Willis based on allegations that she benefited financially from a romantic relationship with prosecutor Nathan Wade. https://t.co/go2DjByksm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 教皇方济各一直患有流感，周五在梵蒂冈举行的一次会议上，他要求助手宣读他准备好的演讲稿，称他尚未从最近的病痛中完全恢复过来。
item.description:
Pope Francis, who has been suffering from the flu, asked an aide to read out his prepared speech at a conference in the Vatican on Friday, saying he has not yet fully recovered from his latest ailment. https://t.co/fT7WOnmZTg

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 在一些家庭准备出发去春运的时候，一段关于一名妇女在飞机上争夺窗帘的新视频引发了关于旅客舒适度和礼貌的新问题。
item.description:
As some families get set to take off for spring break, a new video of a woman battling over a window shade on a plane has sparked a new question about comfort and courtesy for travelers. https://t.co/ZhsCGUHyoI

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 一辆摩托车撞上了一辆汽车，车内有一对母女，佛罗里达州一名副警长思维敏捷，在撞车后几秒钟内就赶到了现场，被誉为拯救了生命。
item.description:
After a motorcycle crashed into a car with a mother and her two daughters inside, a Florida deputy’s quick thinking — and his arrival to the scene within seconds of the collision — is being heralded for saving lives. https://t.co/xniIYmesTZ pic.twitter.com/Q0fA5oqkwl

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）正在起诉 OpenAI 及其首席执行官山姆-阿尔特曼（Sam Altman），称其背叛了该 ChatGPT 制造商的创始宗旨--造福人类而非追求利润。
item.description:
Elon Musk is suing OpenAI and its CEO Sam Altman over what he says is a betrayal of the ChatGPT maker's founding aims of benefiting humanity rather than pursuing profits. https://t.co/WdpKYqMYDR pic.twitter.com/6IFCIIdjDS

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 环保活动人士正在柏林附近的一片森林中举行抗议活动，反对扩建电动汽车制造商特斯拉欧洲首家工厂的计划，并誓言要在原地待命数周。
item.description:
Environmental activists are staging a protest in a forest near Berlin against plans to expand the grounds of electric carmaker Tesla's first plant in Europe and are vowing to stay in place for weeks. https://t.co/QWMSh9SRs6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: "@JamesAALongman 从乌克兰的一家武器工厂发回的报道称："乌克兰人基本上不得不设法秘密制造武器，希望不会遭到俄罗斯人的轰炸。
item.description:
"Essentially the Ukrainians have to try to make weapons in secret, hoping that they don't get bombed by the Russians."@JamesAALongman reports from a weapons factory in Ukraine. https://t.co/SdtJQL2MXP pic.twitter.com/fkORvXAKLV

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 观看直播：ABC 新闻直播间提供当天的头条新闻和最新报道，现在即可观看。

WATCH LIVE: ABC News Live has the day's top stories and up-to-the-minute reports, streaming now. https://t.co/wMwdNe69Ps

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 电视摄像机首次获准拍摄乌克兰的武器制造过程。你可能认为乌克兰不会制造自己的武器--他们的确会。但在西方斡旋多年达成和平条约和不扩散协议后，他们已经大大落后于 #乌克兰
item.description:
The first time TV cameras have been allowed to see Ukrainian arms manufacturing. You might think Ukraine doesn’t make any of their own weapons - they do. But after years of peace treaties and non proliferation agreements brokered by the west, they’re massively behind #ukraine pic.twitter.com/1DMOweKeKg

— James Longman (@JamesAALongman) March 1, 2024

item.title: "如果不是我的家人和朋友有能力把钱存进我的银行账户，我早就流落街头了。"最近的一项研究发现，半数美国人的住房成本负担沉重，这正式反映了全国租房者面临的严峻现实。
item.description:

item.title: "我简直不敢相信。终于有人能证实我所说的话了，这让我感到平反。"在案件有了新的进展之后，杀害大学生的凶手向@ABC2020发表了讲话。
item.description:
"I couldn't believe it. and it felt vindicating to finally have someone that can corroborate what I said."

Convicted killer of college student speaks out to @ABC2020 following new developments in case. https://t.co/xUssbKIA8A

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024
